articles.description: Bulb was put into special administration last November and has effectively been in public ownership ever since, but Octopus Energy is poised to take over the firm's 1.5 million customers.

articles.author: Ellis Whitehouse
articles.title: Essex man jailed for making £2.3m from TV boxes that illegally streamed Sky TV - Essex Live
articles.description: His business Droidsticks Ltd would sell set-top boxes with software that allowed customers to watch Sky Sports and Sky Cinema without paying
articles.content: An Essex businessman has been jailed after he made more than £2million selling thousands of customers TV boxes that allowed them to watch premium Sky TV for free. Halton Mark Anthony Powell sold set-… [+2628 chars]
